about_the_game:
Welcome to Brickhaven

Brickhaven is the very city you and your gang fight to thrive in. Explore the busy streets, check out the shops, and muster up any juicy prospects along the way to help build your criminal empire.

The Empire

-Recruit your members right off the street

-Setup protection rackets, drug fronts, money laundering schemes, and much more to help maximize your profits

-Send members to defend your hard earned rackets and businesses in order to set a physical footprint in the city

-Be as hands off or on as you want, almost everything is able to be automated through delegation

Rule the Streets

-Fight off rival gangs moving in on your turf

-Send gang members to attack rival businesses

-Take over the enemy turf to continue your expansion

Delegate

-Order members to rob civilians, hold up a store, or even do a drive by (drive bys coming soon)

-Setup runners for your rackets to make drops at the gang stash

-Appoint members as dealers, defenders of a business, or put them on patrol to defend the turf

Surviving the Police

-Create enough noise and the cops will catch wind fast

-Survive police raids on warehouses or bribe the chief in order to keep them off your back

-Take out enough cops in an area and they may end up being too scared to come back for a quite a while

Engage In Turf Wars Online and Off

-Multiplayer mode where up to five players can join and all create their own separate gangs. Each player will start off with no money and no gang. They will then have to carefully build up their crews and strategically setup turf defense measures in order to maintain their foothold.

-There will also be the ability to create fragile alliances as well as give businesses and turf up to rivals in order to avoid being crushed

-A solo mode will also be available for players who want to go up against the AI gangs

Permadeath

Making one wrong decision could mean losing your top members forever or even your own life. When the boss of a gang is taken out then you will take the role of the next strongest member in your gang who will then take over. Your gang isn't gone until the last breathing member is taken out.

short_description: Create your gang from nothing. Start off with just yourself and take it from a single member to a sprawling criminal empire. Extort businesses, deal drugs, sell guns, and much more. Customize your gang to partake in whatever crimes you want them to. What kind of boss will you be?
